bike.description: Full high modulus carbon fiber, Dyad Elite lay-up, tri-oval shaped top and down tubes with SST tubing diameters, 1 1/8-1 1/2" head tube, PressFit 30 BB shell, asymmetrical chainstays, twin seat stays, forged one-piece dropouts with replaceable derailleur hanger

components.description: Jamis Xenith Team level, high modulus carbon fiber, 1.5" hollow formed crown, monocoque one-piece forming technology, carbon dropouts with stainless axle interfaces
American Classic 420 Aero 3 wheelset, 18/24H, 34mm aero rims, RD-205/Micro 58 hubs with stainless steel cartridge bearings including QR and AC stainless steel bladed spokes
Shimano Dura Ace Di2 electronic IRD-7970 rear and Dura Ace IFD-7970 braze-on front with Shimano 34.9mm clamp
Shimano Dura Ace Di2 electronic IST-7970 shifters, 20-Speed
Ritchey WCS Logic II, 7050 triple-butted aluminum, 31.8 x 400mm (48/51), 420mm (54/56), 440mm (58/61)
Ritchey WCS 4-Axis, 3D net forged 2014 alloy, 6JAMIS_DEGREE x 90mm (48/51), 100mm (54/56), 120mm (58/61)
Ritchey Pro Carbon, 31.6 x 350mm with Jamis 7075-AL CNC aluminum 1-bolt seat post clamp
Selle San Marco Concor with Microfeel cover and hollow cro-moly rails
